## Descriptive statistics

```{r}

mcnemar <- matrix(c(
  "  ", "F-", "F+",
  "S-", " 2", "15",
  "S+", " 1", " 6"), 
  nrow=3, byrow=TRUE) |>
  data.frame() 
mcnemar |> gt() |> tab_options(column_labels.hidden = TRUE)
```

## Analysis of binary cross-over data

-   Ignoring period effects
    -   McNemar's test
-   Incorporating period effects
    -   Mainland-Gart test (hard to find)
